review: It doesn't work well when my chrome cast is running in another tv
author: Rodrigo

review: Got this free with my sling tv sign up and it is well worth it, I'm actually going to buy more,I also recommend this to friends and family, if you have a  sling tv subscription I recommend fire tv stick over watching it on pc and xbox oneit plays sling flawlessly.plus a dozen of other free apps that are good like redbull tv.
author: Omari

review: Installation was effortless. It worked great for about a week then the videos froze. I had to unplug it to power it off. After the restart, it works fine. Not sure if this will be something I need to do periodically.
author: Robyn G. Thomas

review: Greatest invention since, individually sliced cheese!
author: david morin

review: Pretty good idea and works well, but Amazon needs to make more apps available on the Fire TV stick/Fire TV. They even have some apps (Xfinity TV GO) that are available on Kindle and Fire Phone, but not on Fire TV. I'm hoping app development will come along. Other than that, pretty happy.
author: nathan

review: Works like a charm!!! So happy with this product.
author: Frank Delgado
